question: Which social media platforms are preferred by data scientists working in organizations that have implemented agile project management methodologies?

subtasks.task: Identify organizations that have implemented agile project management methodologies. [CompanyManagementDetail]
Gather data scientists' profiles from these organizations. [PersonaFaceBook, PersonaTwitterProfile]
Analyze the profiles to determine preferred social media platforms. [PersonaFaceBook, PersonaTwitterProfile]
